name: My Pet Rock (itch) (Squant Studios)
description:
My Pet Rock isn't just some GAME.  It's as accurate as one could get to owning a real pet rock without leaving the comfort of your home. Every rock is procedurally generated so no two users should get the same friend.

My pet rock is a simulation to introduce as many people as possible to the joys of owning a pet rock. It's not meant to replace the real thing so much as it's meant to introduce new people to the concept. Our little community is making a comeback!

PS, please download the readme file. I know most people skip those but it's very important and I put a lot of thought into that message!
